item.title: Eclipse IDE Essentials
item.description: My eclipse IDE Introduction In this article, I will briefly go over settings and modifications to eclipse IDE that is essential in my opinion to work smoothly with various projects and look closer to a modern-day IDE.

item.title: Making the best PDF Unlocker / Decryptor App
item.description: Preface My foray into React native happened approximately a month before of publishing date of this article, I know of very little javascript (non ES6) and almost a newb with React ecosystem.
